name: watcharr
description: Watcharr is a self-hosted media watchlist and tracking app. It lets users manage movies and series they want to watch, sync with external services, and see stats in a clean UI.
features: Watchlist management: Create and organize lists of movies and TV shows you want to watch across streaming platforms.
Progress tracking: Mark episodes as watched and track your progress through TV series automatically.
External sync: Integrate with Trakt, Plex, or Jellyfin to sync watch history and keep lists up to date.
Recommendations: Get personalized suggestions based on your watch history and preferences.
Release calendar: View upcoming releases and new episodes for shows on your watchlist with calendar integration.
Statistics dashboard: See viewing stats including total watch time, genres watched, and completion rates.
Multi-user support: Create separate profiles for family members with individual watchlists and preferences.
Search functionality: Find movies and shows quickly with search powered by TMDB or other metadata providers.
Rating system: Rate content you've watched and see aggregated ratings from multiple sources.
Streaming availability: Check which streaming services offer specific titles in your region.
Mobile responsive: Manage your watchlist from any device with a fully responsive web interface.
Export options: Export your watchlist data for backup or migration to other services.
